name: Koi Solitaire
description:
Use your solitaire skills to build gorgeous gardens in this relaxing Card & Board game! Grab cards from the conveyor and place them on the game board next to a card that ranks one higher or lower. Fill in the board and watch your peaceful garden bloom to life. With fun game modes, unique power-ups, and an original storyline, Koi Solitaire is a soothing break that's full of family fun.

- Unlimited play
- Easy to learn and enjoy
- Build gorgeous gardens!
